H1.text: who inaugurated ' world teachers ' day '. United Nations

H2.text: who inaugurated ' world teachers ' day '. Education International

H3.text: who inaugurated ' world teachers ' day '. ILO

A4.text: Established in 1994, it commemorates the signing of recommendation by the International Labour Organization and the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization.

A5.text: The 1966 'ILO/UNESCO Recommendation concerning the Status of Teachers' is a standard-setting instrument that addresses the status and situations of teachers around the world.

A6.text: The final document, 'Recommendation Concerning the Status of Teachers,' was adopted by UNESCO on October 5, 1966.
